# NWProtocolFramer.Instance.WakeupTime.forever

**Case**

A sentinel value to indicate that no wakeup should be delivered.

## Declaration

```swift
case forever
```

## Time Values

- **NWProtocolFramer.Instance.WakeupTime.milliseconds(_:)**: A specific number of milliseconds from now.

items.description: A specific number of milliseconds from now.
